data.message: Absolute great gig! Only got pissed that you announced Not Afraid as the final song and then took 10 minutes to play Lose Yourself, which caused me, along with many other fans, to leave the stage and miss it

replies.message: That's sad to hear, but since Eminem' comeback he has always finished a concert with Lose Yourself. But I hope you had a great time. 👍🏻

Yeah man, i know it, but a few things caused me to leave the place. First, he announced it would be the final song. Second, it was past due the finishing time. And third, he posted a photo with changes in the setlist, with Lose being cut out. But anyway, the show itself was incredible, for 6 yeard i waited for this to happen
Cara, isso se chama Bis. Eu estava lá e esperei até a Lose Yourself. Todo artista faz isso. Toca a ultima música, sai do palco e depois volta pra fazer o Bis.
O bis do Eminem sempre é lose yourself, em todos os shows dele
FYI Most musician's/bands/artists have an encore at the end.  They pretend it is the end of the show and then come back out and play one more song.
I know it, but it was way over the finishing time and everybody had to rush to the public transport, becausr the venue is far far away from downtown and it would close in 30 minutes
Tip...if the venue lights don't come on, stay.  Lights on means it's done
And his band never left the stage. Of course he was gonna come back
Always stay after a concert and always watch the movie credits.
